Uses of Interface
com.picocontainer.ComponentMonitorStrategy

  • Packages that use ComponentMonitorStrategy 
    Package Description
    com.picocontainer
    This package contains the core API for PicoContainer, a compact container for working with the dependency injection pattern.
    com.picocontainer.adapters  
    com.picocontainer.behaviors
    BehaviorFactories make Behaviors which change aspects of component implementations and instances.
    com.picocontainer.classname  
    com.picocontainer.containers
    Containers are the main user entry point for PicoContainer.
    com.picocontainer.injectors
    InjectionFactories make Injectors which implement specific types of dependency injection.
    com.picocontainer.lifecycle
    Alternative implementations of lifecycle strategy for use with a container.
    com.picocontainer.monitors
    A Monitor is something PicoContainer uses to inform on events in component instantiation and lifecycle.

    • Uses of ComponentMonitorStrategy in com.picocontainer

      Classes in com.picocontainer that implement ComponentMonitorStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultPicoContainer

      The Standard PicoContainer/MutablePicoContainer implementation.
      static class  DefaultPicoContainer.LateInstance<T>
      Special Case class that is an adapter instantiated when a component monitor returns a "late resolution" to finding a container.

    • Uses of ComponentMonitorStrategy in com.picocontainer.adapters

      Classes in com.picocontainer.adapters that implement ComponentMonitorStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractAdapter<T>
      Base class for a ComponentAdapter with general functionality.
      class  InstanceAdapter<T>
      Component adapter which wraps a component instance.

      Classes in com.picocontainer.behaviors that implement ComponentMonitorStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AbstractBehavior.AbstractChangedBehavior<T>
      Component adapter which decorates another adapter.
      static class  Automating.Automated<T> 
      static class  Caching.Cached<T>
      ComponentAdapter implementation that caches the component instance.

      static class  FieldDecorating.FieldDecorated<T> 
      static class  Guarding.Guarded<T>
      behaviour for allows components to be guarded by another component
      static class  ImplementationHiding.HiddenImplementation<T>
      This component adapter makes it possible to hide the implementation of a real subject (behind a proxy) provided the key is an interface.
      static class  Intercepting.Intercepted<T> 
      static class  Locking.Locked<T> 
      static class  PropertyApplying.PropertyApplicator<T>
      Decorating component adapter that can be used to set additional properties on a component in a bean style.
      static class  Storing.Stored<T> 
      static class  Synchronizing.Synchronized<T>
      Component Adapter that uses java synchronized around getComponentInstance().
      static class  ThreadCaching.ThreadCached<T>
      This behavior supports caches values per thread.

    • Uses of ComponentMonitorStrategy in com.picocontainer.injectors

      Classes in com.picocontainer.injectors that implement ComponentMonitorStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractFieldInjector<T> 
      class  AbstractInjector<T>
      This ComponentAdapter will instantiate a new object for each call to ComponentAdapter.getComponentInstance(PicoContainer, Type).
      static class  AnnotatedFieldInjection.AnnotatedFieldInjector<T>
      Injection happens after instantiation, and through fields marked as injection points via an Annotation.
      static class  AnnotatedMethodInjection.AnnotatedMethodInjector<T> 
      class  AnnotatedStaticInjection.StaticInjection<T> 
      static class  CompositeInjection.CompositeInjector<T> 
      static class  ConstructorInjection.ConstructorInjector<T>
      Injection will happen through a constructor for the component.
      class  IterativeInjector<T>
      Injection will happen iteratively after component instantiation.
      static class  Jsr330ConstructorInjection.ConstructorInjectorWithForcedPublicCtors<T> 
      static class  MethodInjection.MethodInjector<T>
      Injection will happen through a single method for the component.
      class  MultiArgMemberInjector<T>
      Injection will happen in a member with multiple arguments on the component.
      static class  MultiInjection.MultiInjector<T> 
      static class  NamedFieldInjection.NamedFieldInjector<T>
      Injection happens after instantiation, and fields are marked as injection points via a named field.
      static class  NamedMethodInjection.NamedMethodInjector<T> 
      static class  SetterInjection.SetterInjector<T>
      Instantiates components using empty constructors and Setter Injection.
      class  SpecificFieldInjector<T>
      Takes specific Fields obtained through reflection and injects them.
      class  SpecificMethodInjector<T>
      Injection will happen through a specific single reflection method for the component.
      static class  TypedFieldInjection.TypedFieldInjector<T>
      Injection happens after instantiation, and fields are marked as injection points via a field type.

    • Uses of ComponentMonitorStrategy in com.picocontainer.lifecycle

      Classes in com.picocontainer.lifecycle that implement ComponentMonitorStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractMonitoringLifecycleStrategy
      Abstract base class for lifecycle strategy implementation supporting a ComponentMonitor.
      class  JavaEE5LifecycleStrategy
      Java EE 5 has some annotations PreDestroy and PostConstruct that map to start() and dispose() in our world
      class  ReflectionLifecycleStrategy
      Reflection lifecycle strategy.
      class  StartableLifecycleStrategy
      Startable lifecycle strategy.

    • Uses of ComponentMonitorStrategy in com.picocontainer.monitors

      Classes in com.picocontainer.monitors that implement ComponentMonitorStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractComponentMonitor
      A monitor which delegates to another monitor.
      class  ComposingMonitor
      The first of a list of composers passed in that responds with an instance for a missing component will be used.
